name: Protection Dhikr
description: Powerful remembrances for seeking Allah's protection from all harm

dhikrs.title: Seeking Refuge in Allah's Perfect Words
dhikrs.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
dhikrs.transliteration: A'udhu bi kalimaat-illahi at-tammaati min sharri ma khalaq
dhikrs.translation: I seek refuge in Allah's perfect words from the evil of what He has created.
dhikrs.benefits: Protection from all created beings and their harm

dhikrs.title: Protection from the Evil Eye
dhikrs.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لاَمَّةٍ
dhikrs.transliteration: A'udhu bi kalimaat-illahi at-tammaati min kulli shaytanin wa hammaatin wa min kulli 'aynin lammaah
dhikrs.translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from every devil and harmful thing, and from every evil eye.
dhikrs.benefits: Protection from devils, harmful creatures, and evil eye

dhikrs.title: Seeking Allah's Protection from All Evil
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ وَقَهْرِ الرِّجَالِ
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wa a'udhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wa a'udhu bika minal-jubni wal-bukhl, wa a'udhu bika min ghalabatid-dayni wa qahrir-rijal
dhikrs.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness, miserliness and cowardice, the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.
dhikrs.benefits: Comprehensive protection from psychological and social difficulties

dhikrs.title: Mu'awwidhatayn (The Two Seeking Refuge)
dhikrs.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ * قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
dhikrs.transliteration: Qul a'udhu bi rabbil-falaq min sharri ma khalaq... Qul a'udhu bi rabbin-naas min sharril-waswasil-khannas
dhikrs.translation: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the dawn from the evil of what He has created... Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind from the evil of the retreating whisperer.
dhikrs.benefits: Complete protection from all seen and unseen harm, whispers of Satan
